TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XStreamingElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XML 樹狀目錄中的項目，此樹狀目錄支援延後的資料流 (Streaming) 輸出。

span.span: Represents elements in an XML tree that supports deferred streaming output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可讓您建立 XML 樹狀結構，支援延後資料流的輸出。This class allows you to create an XML tree that supports deferred streaming output. 您可以使用這個類別來建立 XML 樹狀結構非常類似於建立 XML 樹狀結構使用。You use this class to create an XML tree in a very similar fashion to creating an XML tree using . 不過，還有基本差異。However, there is a fundamental difference. 當您使用 LINQ 查詢來指定內容，當建立 XML 樹狀結構使用，在建構 XML 樹狀結構中，逐一查看查詢變數，並且查詢的結果會新增到 XML 樹狀結構。When you use a LINQ query to specify content when creating an XML tree using , the query variable is iterated at the time of construction of the XML tree, and the results of the query are added to the XML tree. 相反地，當您建立 XML 樹狀結構使用，而不進行逐一查看查詢變數的參考儲存在 XML 樹狀結構中。In contrast, when you create an XML tree using , a reference to the query variable is stored in the XML tree without being iterated. 只有在序列化時反覆執行查詢。Queries are iterated only upon serialization. 這可讓您建立較大的 XML 樹狀結構，同時維護小的記憶體使用量。This allows you to create larger XML trees while maintaining a smaller memory footprint. 如果您要串流從輸入來源，例如文字檔案，然後您可以讀取非常大的文字檔，並同時維護小的記憶體使用量產生非常大型的 XML 文件。If you are streaming from an input source, such as a text file, then you can read a very large text file, and generate a very large XML document while maintaining a small memory footprint. 另一種情況是您有大型的 XML 樹狀結構已載入到記憶體中，而且您想要建立文件的轉換的版本。Another scenario is that you have a large XML tree that has been loaded into memory, and you want to create a transformed version of the document. 如果您建立新的文件使用，則您會在轉換完成時的記憶體中有兩個大型 XML 樹狀結構。If you create a new document using , then you will have two large XML trees in memory upon completion of the transformation. 不過，如果您建立新的 XML 樹狀結構使用，然後在下半部中有效地剪下您的工作集。However, if you create the new XML tree using , then your working set will be effectively cut in half. 請注意，當偵錯程式，使用，顯示物件的值會造成其来呼叫的方法。Note that when debugging a program that uses , displaying the value of an object causes its method to be called. 這會導致要序列化的 XML。This causes the XML to be serialized. 如果資料流處理的項目查詢的語意，這類資料流的項目可以只將串流處理一次，這可能會非預期的行為造成偵錯經驗。If the semantics of your streaming element query are such that the streaming element can only be streamed once, this may cause undesirable behavior in your debugging experience. ## Examples 下列範例會先建立一個來源的 XML 樹狀結構。The following example first creates a source XML tree. 然後它會建立來源 XML 樹狀目錄中使用的轉換。It then creates a transform of the source XML tree using . 這項轉換會在記憶體中建立新的樹狀結構。This transform creates a new tree in memory. 然後它會建立來源 XML 樹狀目錄中使用的轉換。It then creates a transform of the source XML tree using . 這項轉換不會執行查詢，直到已轉換的樹狀結構序列化到主控台。This transform doesn't execute the query until the transformed tree is serialized to the console. 其記憶體使用量較少。Its memory usage is less. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XElement dstTree1 = new XElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); XStreamingElement dstTree2 = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(dstTree1); Console.WriteLine("------"); Console.WriteLine(dstTree2); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree1 As XElement = _ <%= From el In srcTree.Elements _ Where (el.Value >= 3) _ Select <%= el.Value %> %> Dim dstTree2 As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(dstTree1) Console.WriteLine("------") Console.WriteLine(dstTree2) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 4 5 ------ 3 4 5 ``` 處理文字檔的其中一個方法是撰寫擴充方法，該方法會使用 `yield return` 建構將文字檔一次串流一行。One approach to processing a text file is to write an extension method that streams the text file a line at a time using the `yield return` construct. 然後您可以撰寫利用延後的方式處理文字檔的 LINQ 查詢。You then can write a LINQ query that processes the text file in a lazy deferred fashion. 如果您稍後使用串流輸出，您就可以建立轉換從文字檔到 XML 的使用最少量的記憶體，不論來源文字檔的大小。If you then use the to stream output, you then can create a transform from the text file to XML that uses a minimal amount of memory, regardless of the size of the source text file. 下列文字檔 People.txt 為這個範例的來源。The following text file, People.txt, is the source for this example. ``` #This is a comment 1,Tai,Yee,Writer 2,Nikolay,Grachev,Programmer 3,David,Wright,Inventor ``` 下列程式碼包含的擴充方法可以用延緩的方式，串流文字檔的行。The following code contains an extension method that streams the lines of the text file in a deferred fashion. ```csharp public static class StreamReaderSequence { public static IEnumerable Lines(this StreamReader source) { String line; if (source == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("source"); while ((line = source.ReadLine()) != null) { yield return line; } } } class Program { static void Main(string[] args) { StreamReader sr = new StreamReader("People.txt"); XStreamingElement xmlTree = new XStreamingElement("Root", from line in sr.Lines() let items = line.Split(',') where !line.StartsWith("#") select new XElement("Person", new XAttribute("ID", items[0]), new XElement("First", items[1]), new XElement("Last", items[2]), new XElement("Occupation", items[3]) ) ); Console.WriteLine(xmlTree); sr.Close(); } } ``` ```vb Module StreamReaderSequence Public Iterator Function Lines(source As IO.StreamReader) As IEnumerable(Of String) If source Is Nothing Then Throw New ArgumentNullException("source") Dim line As String = source.ReadLine() While (line <> Nothing) Yield line line = source.ReadLine() End While End Function End Module Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim sr As New IO.StreamReader("People.txt") Dim xmlTree As New XStreamingElement("Root", From line In sr.Lines() Let items = line.Split(","c) Where Not line.StartsWith("#") Select > <%= items(1) %> <%= items(2) %> <%= items(3) %> ) Console.WriteLine(xmlTree) sr.Close() End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Tai Yee Writer Nikolay Grachev Programmer David Wright Inventor ``` 有時候您必須轉換大型 XML 檔案並撰寫您的應用程式，讓應用程式的記憶體使用量可以預測。Sometimes you have to transform large XML files, and write your application so that the memory footprint of the application is predictable. 如果您嘗試使用非常大的 XML 檔案填入 XML 樹狀結構，您的記憶體使用量將與檔案大小成正比 (也就是，變成過度)。If you try to populate an XML tree with a very large XML file, your memory usage will be proportional to the size of the file (that is, excessive). 因此，您應該改用資料流技術。Therefore, you should use a streaming technique instead. 特定的標準查詢運算子 (例如，) 會反覆查看其來源、收集所有資料、排序這些資料，最後產生順序中的第一個項目。Certain standard query operators, such as , iterate their source, collect all of the data, sort it, and then finally yield the first item in the sequence. 請注意，如果您在產生第一個項目前使用具體化其來源的查詢運算子，您將不會為應用程式保留小的記憶體使用量。Note that if you use a query operator that materializes its source before yielding the first item, you will not retain a small memory footprint for your application. 即使您使用中，所述的技巧，如果您嘗試組合包含已轉換的文件的 XML 樹狀結構，記憶體使用量可能會太大。Even if you use the technique described in , if you try to assemble an XML tree that contains the transformed document, memory usage may be too great. 下列範例會以下連結中的範例為基礎建置：[如何：Stream XML 片段並存取標頭資訊](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01311522-9d03-4977-8641-2932c6f56092)。The following example builds on the example in [How to: Stream XML Fragments with Access to Header Information](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01311522-9d03-4977-8641-2932c6f56092). 這個範例會使用 的延後執行功能來串流輸出。This example uses the deferred execution capabilities of to stream the output. 請注意，自訂座標軸 (`StreamCustomerItem`) 是特別撰寫的，讓它預備擁有 `Customer`、`Name` 和 `Item` 項目的文件，並預期這些項目將會與下列 Source.xml 文件的排列方式相同。Note that the custom axis (`StreamCustomerItem`) is specifically written so that it expects a document that has `Customer`, `Name`, and `Item` elements, and that those elements will be arranged as in the following Source.xml document. 不過，較為複雜的實作方法將會使用 XSD 驗證來源文件，或做為剖析無效文件的準備。A more robust implementation, however, would either validate the source document with an XSD, or would be prepared to parse an invalid document. 下列是來源文件 Source.xml：The following is the source document, Source.xml: ```xml A. Datum Corporation 0001 0002 0003 0004 Fabrikam, Inc. 0005 0006 0007 0008 Southridge Video 0009 0010 ``` 下列程式碼包含可使用的方法串流來源 XML。The following code contains a method that uses an to stream the source XML. 它會使用串流處理新的 XML。It uses to stream the new XML. ```csharp static IEnumerable StreamCustomerItem(string uri) { using (XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(uri)) { XElement name = null; XElement item = null; reader.MoveToContent(); // Parse the file, save header information when encountered, and yield the // Item XElement objects as they are created. // loop through Customer elements while (reader.Read()) { if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element && reader.Name == "Customer") { // move to Name element while (reader.Read()) { if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element && reader.Name == "Name") { name = XElement.ReadFrom(reader) as XElement; break; } } // loop through Item elements while (reader.Read()) { if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.EndElement) break; if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element && reader.Name == "Item") { item = XElement.ReadFrom(reader) as XElement; if (item != null) { XElement tempRoot = new XElement("Root", new XElement(name) ); tempRoot.Add(item); yield return item; } } } } } } } static void Main(string[] args) { XStreamingElement root = new XStreamingElement("Root", from el in StreamCustomerItem("Source.xml") select new XElement("Item", new XElement("Customer", (string)el.Parent.Element("Name")), new XElement(el.Element("Key")) ) ); root.Save("Test.xml"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test.xml")); } ``` ```vb Iterator Function StreamCustomerItem(uri As String) As IEnumerable(Of XElement) Dim name As XElement = Nothing Dim item As XElement = Nothing Dim reader As XmlReader = XmlReader.Create(uri) reader.MoveToContent() ' Parse the file, save header information when encountered, and yield the ' Item XElement objects as they are created. ' Loop through Customer elements. While (reader.Read()) If (reader.NodeType = XmlNodeType.Element And reader.Name = "Customer") Then While (reader.Read()) ' Move to Name element If (reader.NodeType = XmlNodeType.Element And reader.Name = "Name") Then name = CType(XElement.ReadFrom(reader), XElement) Exit While End If End While ' Loop through Item elements While (reader.Read()) If (reader.NodeType = XmlNodeType.EndElement) Then Exit While End If If (reader.NodeType = XmlNodeType.Element And reader.Name = "Item") Then item = CType(XElement.ReadFrom(reader), XElement) If (Not (item Is Nothing)) Then Dim tempRoot = New XElement("Root", New XElement(name) ) tempRoot.Add(item) Yield item End If End If End While End If End While reader.Close() End Function Sub Main() Dim root As New XStreamingElement("Root", From el In StreamCustomerItem("c:\trash\Source.xml") Select New XElement("Item", New XElement("Customer", CStr(el.Parent.Element("Name"))), New XElement(el.Element("Key")))) root.Save("c:\trash\Test.xml") Console.WriteLine(System.IO.File.ReadAllText("c:\trash\Test.xml")) End Sub ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml A. Datum Corporation 0001 A. Datum Corporation 0002 A. Datum Corporation 0003 A. Datum Corporation 0004 Fabrikam, Inc. 0005 Fabrikam, Inc. 0006 Fabrikam, Inc. 0007 Fabrikam, Inc. 0008 Southridge Video 0009 Southridge Video 0010 ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 查詢不會重複直到序列化。Queries are not iterated until the is serialized. 相較之下，使用內容查詢，會在新的建構逐一查看查詢。This is in contrast to using queries for content for an , where queries are iterated at the time of construction of the new . 如需可傳遞至這個建構函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae).

span.span: LINQ to XML

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.Linq.XName name) cil managed

span.span: An that contains the name of the element.

summary.span: 從指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立資料流的項目沒有內容和任何屬性。This constructor creates a streaming element with no content and no attributes. 隱含的轉換，從字串到。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 這個建構函式的典型用法就是指定字串做為參數，而不是建立新。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . ## Examples ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(dstTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(dstTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 4 5 ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

Public Sub New (name As XName, content As Object)

span.span: An that contains the element name.
The contents of the element.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和內容初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立資料流的項目，以指定的內容和屬性。This constructor creates a streaming element with the specified content and attributes. 隱含的轉換，從字串到。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 這個建構函式的典型用法就是指定字串做為參數，而不是建立新。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 查詢不會重複直到序列化。Queries are not iterated until the is serialized. 相較之下，使用內容查詢，會在新的建構逐一查看查詢。This is in contrast to using queries for content for an , where queries are iterated at the time of construction of the new . 如需可傳遞至這個建構函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this constructor, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 此範例會使用下列的 XML 檔案，名為 Source.xml:This example uses the following XML file, named Source.xml: ```xml aaa bbb ccc ```

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱和內容初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立資料流的項目，以指定的內容和屬性。This constructor creates a streaming element with the specified content and attributes. 隱含的轉換，從字串到。There is an implicit conversion from string to . 這個建構函式的典型用法就是指定字串做為參數，而不是建立新。Typical use of this constructor is to specify a string as the parameter instead of creating a new . 查詢不會重複直到序列化。Queries are not iterated until the is serialized. 相較之下，使用內容查詢，會在新的建構逐一查看查詢。This is in contrast to using queries for content for an , where queries are iterated at the time of construction of the new . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 此範例會使用下列的 XML 檔案，名為 Source.xml:This example uses the following XML file, named Source.xml: ```xml aaa bbb ccc ```

LINQ to XML

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(object content) cil managed

param.name: content
param.span: 要加入到資料流項目的內容。

span.span: Content to be added to the streaming element.

summary.span: 將指定的內容當做子系加入至這個 。

span.span: Adds the specified content as children to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式將指定的內容和屬性加入至。This constructor adds the specified content and attributes to the . 雖然您通常可以建構單一陳述式，有時會更方便地以累加方式將內容加入至資料流的項目。While it is often possible to construct the in a single statement, it is sometimes more convenient to add content to the streaming element incrementally. 查詢不會重複直到序列化。Queries are not iterated until the is serialized. 相較之下，使用內容查詢，會在新的建構逐一查看查詢。This is in contrast to using queries for content for an , where queries are iterated at the time of construction of the new . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例會建立新。The following example creates a new . 接著，它會加入兩個查詢至資料流的項目。It then adds two queries to the streaming element. 序列化資料流的項目之前，都不會反覆執行查詢。The queries are not iterated until the streaming element is serialized. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot"); dstTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el <= 1 select new XElement("Child", (int)el) ); dstTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(dstTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot") dstTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value <= 1 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) dstTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(dstTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 3 4 5 ```

summary.span: 將指定的內容當做子系加入至這個 。

span.span: Adds the specified content as children to this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式將指定的內容和屬性加入至。This constructor adds the specified content and attributes to the . 雖然您通常可以建構單一陳述式，有時會更方便地以累加方式將內容加入至資料流的項目。While it is often possible to construct the in a single statement, it is sometimes more convenient to add content to the streaming element incrementally. 查詢不會重複直到序列化。Queries are not iterated until the is serialized. 相較之下，使用內容查詢，會在新的建構逐一查看查詢。This is in contrast to using queries for content for an , where queries are iterated at the time of construction of the new . 如需可以傳遞至此函式的有效內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[有效內容的 XElement 和 XDocument 物件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae)。For details about the valid content that can be passed to this function, see [Valid Content of XElement and XDocument Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aee2d319-5c5f-4b99-9bb4-2f58232577ae). ## Examples 下列範例會建立新。The following example creates a new . 接著，它會加入兩個查詢至資料流的項目。It then adds two queries to the streaming element. 序列化資料流的項目之前，都不會反覆執行查詢。The queries are not iterated until the streaming element is serialized. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot"); dstTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el <= 1 select new XElement("Child", (int)el) ); dstTree.Add( from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(dstTree); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot") dstTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value <= 1 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) dstTree.Add( _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(dstTree) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 1 3 4 5 ```

summary.span: 取得或設定這個資料流項目的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of this streaming element.

value.span: ，其中包含這個資料流項目的名稱。

span.span: An that contains the name of this streaming element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 此範例會建立新的資料流項目，並接著會列印項目的名稱。This example creates a new streaming element, and then prints the name of the element. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(dstTree.Name); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(dstTree.Name) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` NewRoot ```

span.span: Optionally, formatting (indenting) can be disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: stream
param.span: 這個 輸出的目的資料流。

span.span: The stream to output this to.

summary.span: 將這個 輸出到指定的 。

span.span: Outputs this to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將縮排序列化的 XML。The serialized XML will be indented. 將移除所有無意義的空格，並將會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 這個方法的行為是將不會保留不顯著泛空白字元。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space will not be preserved. 如果您想要控制空白字元時，使用的多載採用做為參數。If you want to control white space, use the overload of that takes as a parameter. 使用將未縮排的 XML 儲存選項。Use the option to save unindented XML. 這會導致要寫入所有泛空白字元的空白字元，XML 樹狀結構中所示的寫入器。This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree. 使用選項，如果您想要移除重複的命名空間宣告。Use option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.TextWriter textWriter) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: A that the will be written to.

summary.span: 將這個資料流項目序列化成 。

span.span: Serialize this streaming element to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將縮排序列化的 XML。The serialized XML will be indented. 將移除所有無意義的空格，並將會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 這個方法的行為是不顯著泛空白字元不會保留 XML 樹狀結構中的節點。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space nodes in the XML tree will not be preserved. 如果您想要控制空白字元時，使用其中一個多載採用做為參數。If you want to control white space, use one of the overloads of that take as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會建立一個來源 XML 樹狀結構中，則會具現化來源 XML 樹狀結構上使用查詢。The following example creates a source XML tree, then instantiates an using a query on the source XML tree. 然後，它寫入至資料流的項目。It then writes the streaming element to a . ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); dstTree.Save(new StringWriter(sb)); Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() dstTree.Save(New StringWriter(sb)) Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

summary.span: 將這個資料流項目序列化成檔案。

span.span: Serialize this streaming element to a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將縮排序列化的 XML。The serialized XML will be indented. 將移除所有無意義的空格，並將會加入額外的空白字元，如此會適當地縮排的 XML。All insignificant white space will be removed, and additional white space will be added so that the XML will be properly indented. 這個方法的行為是不顯著泛空白字元不會保留 XML 樹狀結構中的節點。The behavior of this method is that insignificant white space nodes in the XML tree will not be preserved. 如果您想要控制空白字元時，使用其中一個多載採用做為參數。If you want to control white space, use one of the overloads of that take as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會建立資料流的 XML 樹狀結構。The following example creates a streaming XML tree. 然後，它會序列化至檔案資料流的 XML 樹狀結構。It then serializes the streaming XML tree to a file. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el >= 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); dstTree.Save("Test.xml"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test.xml")); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value >= 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) dstTree.Save("Test.xml") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test.xml")) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 4 5 ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed

span.span: A that the will be written to.

summary.span: 將這個資料流項目序列化成 。

span.span: Serialize this streaming element to an .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立並將它寫入。The following example creates an and writes it to an . ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); XmlWriterSettings xws = new XmlWriterSettings(); xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = true; using (XmlWriter xw = XmlWriter.Create(sb, xws)) { XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el == 5 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); dstTree.Save(xw); } Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Dim xws As XmlWriterSettings = New XmlWriterSettings() xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = True Using xw As XmlWriter = XmlWriter.Create(sb, xws) Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value = 5 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) dstTree.Save(xw) End Using Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 5 ```

param.name: stream
param.span: 這個 輸出的目的資料流。

span.span: The stream to output this to.

param.name: options
param.span: 指定格式化行為的 物件。

span.span: A object that specifies formatting behavior.

summary.span: 將這個 輸出至指定的 ，選擇性地指定格式化行為。

span.span: Outputs this to the specified , optionally specifying formatting behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依預設`options`設定為。By default the `options` are set to . 這個選項會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並新增適當的不顯著泛空白字元，以便適當地縮排的 XML。This option will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 這會導致要寫入所有泛空白字元的空白字元，XML 樹狀結構中所示的寫入器。This will cause the writer to write all white spaces exactly as represented in the XML tree. 使用選項，如果您想要移除重複的命名空間宣告。Use option if you want to remove duplicate namespace declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Save (System.IO.TextWriter textWriter, System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions options);
.method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.TextWriter textWriter, valuetype System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions options) cil managed
public: void Save(System::IO::TextWriter ^ textWriter, System::Xml::Linq::SaveOptions options);

param.name: textWriter
param.span: 做為 XML 之輸出目標的 。

span.span: The to output the XML to.
A that specifies formatting behavior.

summary.span: 將這個資料流項目序列化成 (可選擇是否停用格式設定)。

span.span: Serialize this streaming element to a , optionally disabling formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 這會導致要寫入所有泛空白字元的空白字元，XML 樹狀結構中所示的寫入器。This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree. 如果您想要儲存縮排的 XML，未指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the flag for `options`. 這會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並新增適當的不顯著泛空白字元，以便適當地縮排的 XML。This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 這是預設行為，以及多載的行為方法不接受`options`做為參數。This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the methods that do not take `options` as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個方法的兩種用途。The following example shows two uses of this method. 第一次使用保留泛空白字元。The first use preserves white space. 第二個序列化進行格式化。The second one serializes the with formatting. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el == 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); dstTree.Save(new StringWriter(sb), SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); Console.WriteLine("------"); sb = new StringBuilder(); dstTree.Save(new StringWriter(sb), SaveOptions.None); Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value = 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() dstTree.Save(New StringWriter(sb), SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) Console.WriteLine("------") sb = New StringBuilder() dstTree.Save(New StringWriter(sb), SaveOptions.None) Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 ------ 3 ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

summary.span: 將這個資料流項目序列化成檔案 (可選擇是否停用格式設定)。

span.span: Serialize this streaming element to a file, optionally disabling formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要儲存不縮排的 XML，指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save unindented XML, specify the flag for `options`. 這會導致要寫入所有泛空白字元的空白字元，XML 樹狀結構中所示的寫入器。This will cause the writer to write all white space exactly as represented in the XML tree. 如果您想要儲存縮排的 XML，未指定旗標，以`options`。If you want to save indented XML, do not specify the flag for `options`. 這會移除所有多餘的不顯著泛空白字元，並新增適當的不顯著泛空白字元，以便適當地縮排的 XML。This will remove all extraneous insignificant white space, and add appropriate insignificant white space so that the XML is properly indented. 這是預設行為，以及多載的行為方法不接受`options`做為參數。This is the default behavior, and the behavior of the overloads of the methods that do not take `options` as a parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入或剖析 XML 時保留空白字元](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d)並[保留泛空白字元序列化時](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939)。For more information, see [Preserving White Space while Loading or Parsing XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/093a7169-a04e-4638-b08c-d1cb98aa650d) and [Preserving White Space While Serializing](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb146217-0a49-4efc-ac84-7265b91d3939). ## Examples 下列範例會示範這個方法的兩種用途。The following example shows two uses of this method. 第一次使用保留泛空白字元。The first use preserves white space. 第二個序列化進行格式化。The second one serializes the with formatting. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el == 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); dstTree.Save("Test1.xml", SaveOptions.DisableFormatting); dstTree.Save("Test2.xml", SaveOptions.None); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test1.xml")); Console.WriteLine("------"); Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test2.xml")); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value = 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) dstTree.Save("Test1.xml", SaveOptions.DisableFormatting) dstTree.Save("Test2.xml", SaveOptions.None) Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test1.xml")) Console.WriteLine("------") Console.WriteLine(File.ReadAllText("Test2.xml")) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 ------ 3 ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

summary.span: 傳回這個資料流項目的 XML (可選擇是否停用格式設定)。

span.span: Returns the XML for this streaming element, optionally disabling formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，當偵錯程式，使用，顯示物件的值會造成其来呼叫的方法。Note that when debugging a program that uses , displaying the value of an object causes its method to be called. 這會導致要序列化的 XML。This causes the XML to be serialized. 如果資料流處理的項目查詢的語意，這類資料流的項目可以只將串流處理一次，這可能會非預期的行為造成偵錯經驗。If the semantics of your streaming element query are such that the streaming element can only be streamed once, this may cause undesirable behavior in your debugging experience.

summary.span: 傳回這個資料流項目之格式化 (縮排) 的 XML。

span.span: Returns the formatted (indented) XML for this streaming element.
A containing the indented XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，當偵錯程式，使用，顯示物件的值會造成其来呼叫的方法。Note that when debugging a program that uses , displaying the value of an object causes its method to be called. 這會導致要序列化的 XML。This causes the XML to be serialized. 如果資料流處理的項目查詢的語意，這類資料流的項目可以只將串流處理一次，這可能會非預期的行為造成偵錯經驗。If the semantics of your streaming element query are such that the streaming element can only be streamed once, this may cause undesirable behavior in your debugging experience. ## Examples 下列範例示範兩種用法。The following example shows two uses of . 第一次使用保留泛空白字元。The first use preserves white space. 第二個序列化進行格式化。The second one serializes the with formatting. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el == 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(dstTree.ToString(SaveOptions.DisableFormatting)); Console.WriteLine("------"); Console.WriteLine(dstTree.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value = 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(dstTree.ToString(SaveOptions.DisableFormatting)) Console.WriteLine("------") Console.WriteLine(dstTree.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 ------ 3 ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToString(valuetype System.Xml.Linq.SaveOptions options) cil managed
Public Function ToString (options As SaveOptions) As String

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: A that specifies formatting behavior.

summary.span: 傳回這個資料流項目的 XML (可選擇是否停用格式設定)。

span.span: Returns the XML for this streaming element, optionally disabling formatting.
A containing the XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，當偵錯程式，使用，顯示物件的值會造成其来呼叫的方法。Note that when debugging a program that uses , displaying the value of an object causes its method to be called. 這會導致要序列化的 XML。This causes the XML to be serialized. 如果資料流處理的項目查詢的語意，這類資料流的項目可以只將串流處理一次，這可能會非預期的行為造成偵錯經驗。If the semantics of your streaming element query are such that the streaming element can only be streamed once, this may cause undesirable behavior in your debugging experience. ## Examples 下列範例示範兩種用法。The following example shows two uses of . 第一次使用保留泛空白字元。The first use preserves white space. 第二個序列化進行格式化。The second one serializes the with formatting. ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el == 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); Console.WriteLine(dstTree.ToString(SaveOptions.DisableFormatting)); Console.WriteLine("------"); Console.WriteLine(dstTree.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value = 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> _ ) Console.WriteLine(dstTree.ToString(SaveOptions.DisableFormatting)) Console.WriteLine("------") Console.WriteLine(dstTree.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` 3 ------ 3 ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteTo(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed

span.span: An into which this method will write.

summary.span: 將這個資料流項目寫入 。

span.span: Writes this streaming element to an .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構使用。The following example creates an XML tree using . 然後，它寫入至資料流的項目。It then writes the streaming element to an . ```csharp XElement srcTree = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child", 1), new XElement("Child", 2), new XElement("Child", 3), new XElement("Child", 4), new XElement("Child", 5) ); XStreamingElement dstTree = new XStreamingElement("NewRoot", from el in srcTree.Elements() where (int)el == 3 select new XElement("DifferentChild", (int)el) ); StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); XmlWriterSettings xws = new XmlWriterSettings(); xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = true; xws.Indent = true; using (XmlWriter xw = XmlWriter.Create(sb, xws)) { dstTree.WriteTo(xw); } Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()); ``` ```vb Dim srcTree As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 Dim dstTree As XStreamingElement = _ New XStreamingElement("NewRoot", _ From el In srcTree.Elements() _ Where el.Value = 3 _ Select <%= el.Value %> ) Dim sb As StringBuilder = New StringBuilder() Dim xws As XmlWriterSettings = New XmlWriterSettings() xws.OmitXmlDeclaration = True xws.Indent = True Using xw As XmlWriter = XmlWriter.Create(sb, xws) dstTree.WriteTo(xw) End Using Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString()) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml 3 ```

span.span: LINQ to XML
